name: Solugenix
description: Solugenix is an information technology services firm that has a rich history of providing comprehensive technology services and solutions for more than four decades. As a pioneer in IT services, we’ve partnered with some of the biggest global corporations across many industries. Our history was built on a foundation of partnerships with global brands like McDonald’s, Microsoft, CIT Group, Johnson & Johnson, Herbalife, Sony Pictures Entertainment, and many others.
